timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: The method name is vague. hideInformation: what kind of information? for what purpose? Although I admit I can't really suggest a better name without making it too long.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

replies.bodyText: It's only used on it's own once in GetFeedbackSessionAction for INSTRUCTOR_RESULT so I've changed it's name to reflect that appropriately
replies.author: madanalogy

timeline.message: Clean up comments and refactor hide method
